content: **stitch counts are not included this is a tutorial on making fingerless mitts starting with your yarn and your needles you will knit a gauge swatch determine your gauge and apply that to the hand measurements ** this technique will work with any yarn for any size project from a small child to an adult the tutorial includes in-depth videos on tubular co in the round tubular bobble in the round m1 increases and how to create a perfect thumb gusset the pattern also covers calculating gauge from a gauge swatch and how to determine ease this was originally made for a knitting class that i teach at our local junior college
